alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lauderdale, southeastern Colbert and north central Lawrence Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tuscumbia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, Littleville, Leighton, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville and Northwest Alabama Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
